metadata.dc:author: Melgarejo Moreno, P J
Ruiz Macia, J A
Hellín Meseguer, D
Gil Vélez, M
metadata.dc:description: Primary laryngeal actinomycosis is rare. The case of a woman with diabetes that presented with a 2-month history of hoarseness and cough is reported. The literature is reviewed and the clinical features and histology of laryngeal actinomycosis are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: La actinomicosis laríngea primaria.
[Primary laryngeal actinomycosis].
